SEQLinkage Python3 ENV BASE 

conda create -n seqpy3base
conda install -c conda-forge xeus-cling
conda install python
conda install -c anaconda swig 
conda install -c conda-forge nodejs
conda install -c conda-forge gh
pip install nbdev jupyter_contrib_nbextensions notebook jupyterlab pandas numpy scipy scikit-learn matplotlib aquirdturtle_collapsible_headings
cd ~/Github/linkage/cstatgen/
python setup.py install

1.Sub-developing env seqpy3v0 

conda create -n seqpy3v0 -c seqpy3base
pip install EggLib

SEQLinakge rpy2 env 

conda create -n rpy2 -c conda-forge r-essentials r-base
conda install -c anaconda swig 
conda install -c conda-forge nodejs
conda install -c conda-forge gh
pip install nbdev jupyter_contrib_nbextensions notebook jupyterlab pandas numpy scipy scikit-learn matplotlib aquirdturtle_collapsible_headings
pip install EggLib
pip install rpy2
cd ~/Github/linkage/cstatgen/
python setup.py install
